android, igual las apps funcionan diferente  supongo
yo lo tngo puesto en everyone para dm pero en lo d las llamadas esta puesto solo gente d mi adress book, pero tampoco es que pueda cambiar eso 😂 la app esta patas arriba

el tema este con los DM es un percal como artists pq se que muchos d nosotras conseguimos trabajo d commissions desde las apps y cerrarte a cal y canto los dms  t puede hacer perder curro. Que  pesao el Muskio, ya se podria buscar otro hobby, que nadie en ninun momento queria llamadas  d twitter😂

a mi no me deja desactivarlo, me dice hey, sincroniza tus contactos y si dices que no pues t lo activa d nuevo, por defecto t pone que solo t pueden llamar contactos en tu agenda así que espero que eso signifique que si la agenda esta vacia no t pueden llamar. No voy a sincronizar nada 😂

Heads up: If you have an Adobe account, for Acrobat or Photoshop or whatever: they've turned on the "we will pillage your work for AI" setting. Go to Adobe account website on desktop -> Account and Security -> Data and Privacy Settings -> Content Analysis. Turn it off.
Wearing braces again on my mid thirties was not on my bingo

I think I will need to wear braces again ( I wore braces for years back in the day but my previous dentist told us I did not have wisdom teeth when it was not true) my teeth have moved back and my actual Dentist told me if we did not do something I would loose one of my front teeth 🥲
IT IS! I am super excited to go back into it, prepared for laughs and tears

🎨I'm opening up 4 more spots for art mentoring! Sessions are 1 hour, private videocall and cost 50 euro. It can be for a 1 time portfolio session or something more repetitive with homework included as we work on strengthening your skillset!
Comms open for Feb~March! Comm info is available through the link in my bio. Looking forward to seeing what you all have in mind!

Inspired by Heinrich Lefler's calendar and the works of Hermann Vogel, I want to create my own dark, folksy fantasy calendar. And as a big thank you for your support, you will receive a foil-printed postcard every month ✉️ ✨

Hey everyone!
